Geometry in well known text format

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Council' (q7y7-kk3x) the point in column 'geometry' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Hamilton County Census Tracts - 2010' (c8ia-b5u2) the point in column 'geometry' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: Tennessee Social Vulnerability Index
resource.description: Social Vulnerability Index data for Census Tracts from the CDC. For more information and field definitions visit  https://svi.cdc.gov/Documents/Data/2018_SVI_Data/SVI2018Documentation-508.pdf

resource.name: Biased Based Policing Overview
resource.description: This dataset contains high level summary statistics from multiple Chattanooga Police Department data sources broken down by Race and Census tract.  Following guidelines from the Center for Policing Equity, the data set seeks to highlight any disproportional outcomes based on population and other factors.

resource.name: Census Response Rates by City
resource.description: Data pulled from the US Census Bureau for response rates by City/Place for the US decennial 2020 census.
columns_description: Date the data is up to date
Common name for place or location.
The cumulative internet only response rate up until the Response Date.
The cumulative response rate for the place up until the Response Date.
Indicates "Y" if the row is for the most recent date of data available.
